fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / LIGHT BENDING GUY
fields.Description: Dialogue with a man so rich that light literally bends around his face.

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""Wow.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wow."

fields.Title: Authority: "Stop embarrassing yourself. Pop a m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop embarrassing yourself. Pop a magnesium and calm down.

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.container_door_ultraliberal_knock"]
Variable["cargo.container_door_ultraliberal_knock"]
!(Variable["cargo.container_door_ultraliberal_knock"])
You: ""It's the organs. She hardly has an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's the organs. She hardly has anything left."

fields.Title: Empathy: "At least she still has her heart in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: At least she still has her heart intact, unlike some people here.

fields.Title: You: "(Nod solemnly.) "Terribly.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Nod solemnly.) "Terribly."

fields.Title: You: ""Nah, it's just another fad. But th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nah, it's just another fad. But there's something else special about this painting."

fields.Title: You: ""It's art that is produced by way o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's art that is produced by way of sneezing."
fields.Alternate1: "It's art that is produced by the trigeminal nerve."

fields.Title: You: ""You're actually the first person t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're actually the first person to see this painting after the artist."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Still, only two people have seen i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Still, only two people have seen it thus far. That makes it pretty *exclusive* and therefore potentially valuable."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""And if I don't buy it now, more pe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And if I don't buy it now, more people will see it -- ergo its value will drop."

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.mrlb_cyclo_coefficient"]
Variable["cargo.mrlb_cyclo_coefficient"]
!(Variable["cargo.mrlb_cyclo_coefficient"])
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""A-ha. And the name of the piece?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A-ha. And the name of the piece?" He leans in to take a good look at the rectangular plastic board coated thick with emulsion.

fields.Title: You: ""What is Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Grou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Group?"

fields.Title: keith or no keith
You: ""I'm a detective.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a detective."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["XP.confirm_name_harry"] == false  and  Variable["tc.harry"] == false  and  Variable["tc.name_full_harrier"] == false

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he says warmly. "Though I'm sorry to hear a good public servant like yourself is in servitude to *the drink*. A man can't serve two masters, in my experience."

fields.Title: You: ""Don't you think that you should us..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't you think that you should use your great wealth for the glory of your fatherland?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're a thief. People out there a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a thief. People out there are working their asses off while you *chill* here."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Sure, and they benefit when I buy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure, and they benefit when I buy things to stimulate the economy. Do you know how many jobs it takes to build and maintain a racing yacht?"

fields.Title: You: ""Those things all sound pretty nice.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those things all sound pretty nice."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "What's worse than throwing money at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's worse than throwing money at something that's already failed?

fields.Title: Empathy: "A place to teach them practical ski..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A place to teach them practical skills like teamwork and self-discipline.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Very impressive. You've got a natu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very impressive. You've got a natural eye for unusual investment opportunities."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you think, Kim? Not bad, h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think, Kim? Not bad, huh?"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "CHA-CHING. What'll it be? Speed? Vo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: CHA-CHING. What'll it be? Speed? Vodka? Cigarettes?

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you Harr... I mea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pleasure to meet you Harr... I mean, Tequila Sunset," he says warmly. "It is an odd name, to be sure. There's something... rather grim about it."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "And blow."
fields.Dialogue Text: And blow.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Some of my lower-net-worth friends..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some of my lower-net-worth friends say to me, 'But doesn't that take all the fun out of it?' and I tell them, 'Not really.'"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm saying there's no sense throwi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm saying there's no sense throwing good money after bad."

fields.Title: You: ""Pay raises for officers and genero..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pay raises for officers and generous benefits."

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.mrlb_single_digit_billionaire"]
Variable["cargo.mrlb_single_digit_billionaire"]
!(Variable["cargo.mrlb_single_digit_billionaire"])
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The art market? Intriguing. You've..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The art market? Intriguing. You've already convinced me to invest in you, so please, go on -- tell me what you're thinking."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, the Milton 32-8 knock?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, the Milton 32-8 knock?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Rehm's using it in their next mode..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Rehm's using it in their next model. I can't wait for mine to turn up! My predictions say its improved speed and azimuthal range should increase my trade efficiency by a whopping 46%. You really should order one if you don't want to be left behind."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pray tell." The human shape within..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pray tell." The human shape within the light appears to lean even closer. Tiny dots flood your retina as the shipping container gets too bright.

fields.Title: You: ""It's something even worse. See, sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's something even worse. See, she got involved with Mesque bangers..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well, I'm sure her work represents some very interesting *internal* struggle. Probably with mental illness. Yes, that sounds right."

fields.Title: Logic: "He only wants to hear about struggl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He only wants to hear about struggles he isn't familiar with.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That changes everything.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That changes everything."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "The comfortably wealthy want their..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The comfortably wealthy want their views challenged when making a purchase. Don't hold back.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Now, was there anything else I cou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, was there anything else I could help you with?"
fields.Alternate1: "Now, was there anything else I could help you gentlemen with?"

fields.Title: You: "(Nod.) "Keith.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Nod.) "Keith."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That concludes *our part* of the t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That concludes *our part* of the transaction. Once you've turned over the asset, my people will get the legal ball rolling."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Just a mixing palette? But where d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just a mixing palette? But where does the value lie then?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Great work -- that might have done..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Great work -- that might have done it.

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.mrlb_concept_karperie"]
Variable["cargo.mrlb_concept_karperie"]
!(Variable["cargo.mrlb_concept_karperie"])
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh, *that's* what you mean. Yes, I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, *that's* what you mean. Yes, I've heard of this effect, though I've never witnessed it myself, of course. It has something to do with our Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh, don't you worry, lieutenant. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, don't you worry, lieutenant. I can tell a good man when I see one."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could you please stop asking *ever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could you please stop asking *everyone* for money? It does not reflect well on the RCM and to be perfectly frank we can't afford to look worse than we already do."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""As you may know, us high-net-worth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As you may know, us high-net-worth individuals do not have a lot of cash on hand. Investments and liquidity are enemies of one another -- I think I only have coins for coffee machines."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure you don't have any mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure you don't have any more? I thought you were a billionaire?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I am *not* having a stroke. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I am *not* having a stroke. You're just... still full of surprises. Most of them bad, but some good..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'm ready.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm ready."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hold on. Have we met before?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on. Have we met before?"

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you for the advice.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for the advice."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The shape stands in stunned silence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The shape stands in stunned silence.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Go right ahead.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go right ahead."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man pauses, considering your wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man pauses, considering your words. The light bends and swims around his face. You cannot tell what he's thinking...

fields.Title: You: ""Radiocomputers for every precinct.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Radiocomputers for every precinct."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You know, that's *exactly* what I'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, that's *exactly* what I've heard. From what I understand, the RCM as currently constituted is essentially a lost cause..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmmmm, a tried-and-true strategy f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmmmm, a tried-and-true strategy for increasing the perception of value without improving the underlying asset. Not bad. But still..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "A man this *chill* is at least a tr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A man this *chill* is at least a triple-digit billionaire.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "We've hit the big time! This is the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We've hit the big time! This is the man who's going to make you *rich*. Always rely on your friendly neighbourhood swindler.

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.mrlb_asked_money"]
Variable["cargo.mrlb_asked_money"]
!(Variable["cargo.mrlb_asked_money"])
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""However, there are a few *complica..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "However, there are a few *complications*.... I don't have the cash on me right now to pay for art of this calibre. What I can instead offer are shares in Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Group."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""This is a stock certificate. Well,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a stock certificate. Well, a photocopy of one. Nevertheless, it's solid proof that you own shares in Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Group."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""*Every day*?" The blinding light b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Every day*?" The blinding light becomes almost melancholy. "But how does she find time to do any work?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmm, I do cling to it rather a lot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, I do cling to it rather a lot. Perhaps that is one of my shortcomings -- I just haven't realised it before now."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Yeah-yeah, you're doing a good deed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah-yeah, you're doing a good deed here, really giving back to society. Just give us the money already.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Wow, he worked it out all by himsel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow, he worked it out all by himself. Such a clever boy. But is he gonna pay up?

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "There's no sign of a reaction for a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no sign of a reaction for a good three seconds. Then...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Ten seconds -- borders dissipate. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ten seconds -- borders dissipate. Twenty seconds -- loss of self. Thirty seconds -- everything dissimilates into raw unreality.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Complete nonsense -- both 'karperie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Complete nonsense -- both 'karperie' and what you just said. Can't bathe in thoughts!

fields.Title: You: ""There's something strange about yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's something strange about you."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The hand that allocates resources..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The hand that allocates resources among men is invisible and cruel, but it is *steady*, *measured*, indeed it is *just*."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
You: ""Ummm... I really don't know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ummm... I really don't know."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, a fellow history buff! I, myse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, a fellow history buff! I, myself, am currently reading up on Franconigerian-era trains. Very interesting stuff. "

fields.Title: You: ""You're right. That was extremely u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. That was extremely unprofessional. I apologize."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Reminds you of that Joyce woman, do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Reminds you of that Joyce woman, doesn't he? Can't get rich by giving out free money.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Here's a round of seed funding. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Here's a round of seed funding. This should be enough to prove out the concept and get things off the ground."

fields.Title: Composure: "The lieutenant has granted you an a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant has granted you an aura of legitimacy. Bathe in it, but don't let your satisfaction show. Play it cool.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Well, at first everything was rosy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, at first everything was rosy, the ideas were solid, but they were lacking in... how do I put it..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I guess the inordinate amount of t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess the inordinate amount of time they poured into drawing mythical creatures did not generate a return on investment."

fields.Title: You: ""Did you try to salvage the project..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you try to salvage the project somehow?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is not..." The lieutenant stops..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is not..." The lieutenant stops to rub his temples. "Never mind."

fields.Title: You: ""Imagine, a massive gun that uses a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Imagine, a massive gun that uses a magnetic accelerator to accelerate highly energized hydrogen-based plasma to near light speed. At contact with anything it detonates with the *power of a dying star*, erasing it from existence in a flash of periwinkle blue!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not the blaasma gun again." The li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not the blaasma gun again." The lieutenant takes off the glasses and rubs his eyes with his fingers. "It's not even *possible*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ask me, he's only serving o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you ask me, he's only serving one of them thus far," the lieutenant mutters, half to himself.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I like that you're thinking about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I like that you're thinking about the future, but couldn't the centre have a more... economic focus?"

fields.Title: You: ""Because if you don't, who will?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because if you don't, who will?"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
You: ""Yeah, that last one. Ile-de-Casher..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, that last one. Ile-de-Casherbrume."

fields.Title: Variable["tc.that_in_revachol"]
Variable["tc.that_in_revachol"]
!(Variable["tc.that_in_revachol"])
Encyclopedia: "The Milton 32-8 knock was created t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Milton 32-8 knock was created through data sonification. It's based on the time series data of the world's most profitable bank during its prosperous years in the Thirties. The peak points were turned into the rhythm that makes up the knock.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""An artist's value doubles if they..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An artist's value doubles if they come with a good backstory. I thought you were an experienced art dealer, you should know this."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What a sad, sad story. I should as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What a sad, sad story. I should ask Rhéa to look into this, maybe the foundation can set up some scholarships for cases like these."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But perhaps I judge too quickly. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But perhaps I judge too quickly. Is there an intelligent reasoning behind the method?"

fields.Title: Composure: "His scintillating face-shape flashe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His scintillating face-shape flashes with an expression that resembles disgust.

fields.Title: You: ""Design is nothing. Let it go. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Design is nothing. Let it go. It's holding you back."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh yeah. Duh!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah. Duh!"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for you and this individual has now dropped to .9989 repeating.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Wouldn't say it's exactly *safe* no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wouldn't say it's exactly *safe* now -- but financially secure individuals are known adrenaline junkies.

fields.Title: You: ""Grotbags. Actually, make that Gran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Grotbags. Actually, make that Granny Grotbags."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "That's just one of the many dangers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's just one of the many dangers of getting too deep into karperie.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man stands at the far end of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man stands at the far end of the shipping container. It's hard to say anything more about him. You cannot make out any of his details, but you do feel the overwhelming presence of... capital.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he says warmly. "Public service is a noble cause."

fields.Title: You: ""I should get back to my investigat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I should get back to my investigation. Thanks for your time." [Leave.]
fields.Alternate1: "We should get back to our investigation. Thanks for your time." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "Something's amiss. The light beams..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something's amiss. The light beams bend around his face and scatter in a thousand directions. It seems the laws of physics do not apply here. They are suspended, distorted, an echo.

fields.Title: You: ""What's going on in here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's going on in here?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man chuckles. "To be perfectly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man chuckles. "To be perfectly blunt, I inherited my fortune from my grandmother, who, herself, was an extremely high-net-worth individual back in Graad..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, nothing. It's just that we've..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, nothing. It's just that we've got this *murder* to solve, and yet you go around asking everyone about *money*. And every time I ask, 'Are you sure this is related to the case?', you say, 'Sure, Kim. I think it is'..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But then, once you've reached my p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But then, once you've reached my position, it's nearly impossible for me *not* to make money. My assets are so diversified that I'm bound to come out ahead no matter what..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [MRLG Main hub]
You: ""You're right. Capital accumulation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. Capital accumulation is its own reward."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Spending money is a matter of desi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Spending money is a matter of desire, I'm sure you agree. I don't have the desire for spending it like that."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's the idea, my friend! You've..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's the idea, my friend! You've got to work for the rest."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""A youth centre, huh? What *kind* o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A youth centre, huh? What *kind* of youth centre?"

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not *un*-impressed. Let's lea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am not *un*-impressed. Let's leave it at that."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Nobody knows for sure, but the pla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nobody knows for sure, but the place can't be pretty."

fields.Title: You: ""You should make your money work fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You should make your money work for you."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I'm not so sure about th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I'm not so sure about that."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'm listening.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm listening."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for you and this individual appears to be...

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""*Dozens*, at least. Of course, in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Dozens*, at least. Of course, in the future it'll all be automated. But my point is this..." he says, jabbing his finger into the air a bit...

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmmm," the man thinks for a moment..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmmm," the man thinks for a moment.

fields.Title: You: ""Look man, markets are always going..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look man, markets are always going like this." (Make an up-and-down motion with your hand.)

Variable["cargo.mrlb_wcheck_done_success"]

You: "(Take the scroll.) "Thanks.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Take the scroll.) "Thanks."

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.mrlb_interfacing_cryptograph"]
Variable["cargo.mrlb_interfacing_cryptograph"]
!(Variable["cargo.mrlb_interfacing_cryptograph"])
Pain Threshold: "Seems like he's not actually that i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems like he's not actually that interested in hearing the details. Too bad, you had a good story cooked up...

fields.Title: You: ""Oh yeah, this is all about the hou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah, this is all about the housing crisis. The artist doesn't even have a home."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh yes, I see it now. Very *graphi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yes, I see it now. Very *graphic*, isn't it? Really delivers insight into what it's like being that... unruly."

fields.Title: Jump to: [pitch hub]
Savoir Faire: "Sounds like a winner. Good pitch."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds like a winner. Good pitch.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""*Dangerous*? I like things that ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Dangerous*? I like things that are dangerous. You could even say I'm one of these 'adrenaline-junkies'." The light emanating from him seems to intensify.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.mrlb_political_questions"]
Variable["cargo.mrlb_political_questions"]
!(Variable["cargo.mrlb_political_questions"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see nothing of the sort. To be f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I see nothing of the sort. To be frank, all I see is a gentleman who's unusually well dressed for Martinaise. In a cargo container. Which, I admit, is odd."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""By the way, let me now ask *you* a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the way, let me now ask *you* a question: Where are we, exactly?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Don't get me wrong: They're nice t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't get me wrong: They're nice things, but once you achieve a certain level of wealth your time and mental space become *much* more important than material goods."

fields.Title: You: ""We're in Martinaise. There's a cre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're in Martinaise. There's a creepy abandoned commercial area here."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Come on, man. He's *got* to have mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Come on, man. He's *got* to have more than that. See if you can score a little more of that *lucre*.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You're welcome. You know..." His e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're welcome. You know..." His eyes narrow, the light seems to bend more *aggressively*.

fields.Title: You: ""Highly educated, work-ready, human..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Highly educated, work-ready, human capital ready to be directed toward any number of your vast interests."

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, are you alright?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, are you alright?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sorry. I just don't see the RO..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry. I just don't see the ROI in that."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It's perfectly alright. Based on y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's perfectly alright. Based on your appearance I can tell I'm dealing with a civilized man..."

fields.Title: You: ""A million?!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A million?!"

fields.Title: You: ""You know, a regular youth centre,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, a regular youth centre, with basketball courts and stuff. To *really* develop their physical proficiency."

fields.Title: You: ""Good. Now that we've sorted that o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Now that we've sorted that out, let me ask you something else."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "A place to train *buff kids*."
fields.Dialogue Text: A place to train *buff kids*.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm saying it's fun to ride the li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm saying it's fun to ride the lion until it's time to get off."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You're welcome. Now, was there som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're welcome. Now, was there something else I could help you with?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You want to take an incompetent an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You want to take an incompetent and corrupt police force and give them *deadlier* weapons? No, no, that won't work..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If I could interject: the RCM's pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I could interject: the RCM's problems are mainly *structural*. We're hamstrung by a lack of clear lines of authority, and our system of performance reviews strongly *disincentivizes* inter-precinct cooperation."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mr. Diodore, I am Lieutenant Kim K..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Diodore, I am Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi of the RCM, and this is my partner..."
fields.Alternate1: "Mr. Diodore, I think there's been some confusion. His name is, in fact, *not* Savvy." He glares at you. "Let's start over. I am Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi of the RCM, and this is my partner..."

fields.Title: You: ""Man, being a high-net-worth indivi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man, being a high-net-worth individual sounds great."

fields.Title: You: ""It's as if something is happening..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's as if something is happening to the light."

fields.Title: You: ""We're in Revachol, formerly a colo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're in Revachol, formerly a colony of the Kingdom of Suresne."

fields.Title: You: ""So you travel from place to place..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you travel from place to place via shipping container?"

fields.Title: You: "Present a sound investment plan."
fields.Dialogue Text: Present a sound investment plan.

Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Was it Kras Mazov that said 'relig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was it Kras Mazov that said 'religion is pyrholidon for the masses'?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, interesting. I've made quite a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, interesting. I've made quite a few real-estate plays over the years."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Deploying high-concept buzzword gen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Deploying high-concept buzzword generator. All systems functional: Ready to engage in 3, 2, 1...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And yet it never seems to get us a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And yet it never seems to get us any closer to solving the case."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "These ultraliberal types love losin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These ultraliberal types love losing huge sums of money on ludicrous proposals. Ergo, you should come up with a plan that's TOTALLY dead in the water.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "*Bratan*, now's your chance to take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Bratan*, now's your chance to take some time off. Spend it with your good buddy, and get absolutely *wrecked* in the process.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Nothing less than total annihilatio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing less than total annihilation will suffice.

fields.Title: You: ""Hello, darkness.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, darkness."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Sadly, when we got there, it was t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sadly, when we got there, it was too late. The concept had run out of steam, only dust remained."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The thing about investing is that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The thing about investing is that the less work you have to do, the better. Don't over-think. That's what return on investment means."

fields.Title: You: ""It's Harrier Du Bois, but I prefer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's Harrier Du Bois, but I prefer to be called Tequila Sunset."

fields.Title: You: ""Cool. I don't even have any intere..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool. I don't even have any interesting replies."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Capital." He nods. "Makes one spee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Capital." He nods. "Makes one speechless, does it not? Blinds like the sun that rises from beyond the horizon after a gloomy winter."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The *blaasma gun* that shoots periw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The *blaasma gun* that shoots periwinkle blue high energy plasma! This is your chance...

Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""All I did was take her fortune and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All I did was take her fortune and invest it prudently. Believe it or not, it takes more than a bit of skill not to blow a vast fortune on sailing boats, bad choices, and *unsupervised* state policy."

fields.Title: You: ""Our what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Our what?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'm already on the board of two ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm already on the board of two major arms manufacturers. I've got no shortage of guns, if I wanted such things..."

fields.Title: You: ""That sounds like a lot of work.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That sounds like a lot of work."

fields.Title: Logic: "That's not good -- for you."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's not good -- for you.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Splendid." You hear the sound of e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Splendid." You hear the sound of expensive fabrics brushing against each other. When it stops, a roll of paper emerges from the radiance.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Any details? I've heard some strug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Any details? I've heard some struggling families have to sell their organs to pay the rent. There is also the terrible misfortune of having to go get your own groceries when you're poor. Which one is it?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Please, if there's something I'm m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please, if there's something I'm missing, I'd love to know what it is."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I see. What is so special about it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I see. What is so special about it then?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "He ate that right up. Pretty sure y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He ate that right up. Pretty sure you've done it.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "This transaction has changed the ph..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This transaction has changed the physical relationship between you. You are now more alike somehow.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "There! The blinding light dimmed ju..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There! The blinding light dimmed just long enough for you to see his true form! He looked like a regular middle-aged man!

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""A painter, eh? I am always looking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A painter, eh? I am always looking to expand into new asset classes. Who's the artist?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Not even a pseudonym?" The light a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not even a pseudonym?" The light appears to vibrate with surprise.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Well, I think that settles it. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, I think that settles it. You've found a buyer, my friend. A pleasure transacting with you." The light around him warms you like a friendly embrace.

fields.Title: You: ""What are 'shares' and what can I d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are 'shares' and what can I do with them?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""So! What's next on the agenda?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So! What's next on the agenda?"

fields.Title: Logic: "Seems like a clever investment. Def..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems like a clever investment. Definitely worth thinking about if you care about your future.

fields.Title: You: ""What's the matter, Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the matter, Kim?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Go right ahead, don't be shy.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go right ahead, don't be shy."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Are you talking about my chin?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you talking about my chin?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Which one? Revachol, where I nomin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which one? Revachol, where I nominally reside? Or Graad, where my father emigrated from? Or Ile-de-Casherbrume where I've registered my shell companies?"

fields.Title: You: ""You should invest in the RCM!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You should invest in the RCM!"

fields.Title: You: ""I know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you for placing your unwaver..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for placing your unwavering *trust* in me."

Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""They pitched me and a handful of o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They pitched me and a handful of other investors on an idea for a role-playing game that would, in their words, change the world."

Variable["cargo.mrlb_greet_done"]
!(Variable["cargo.mrlb_greet_done"])
You: "Ignore him."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ignore him.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have a *murder* to solve, and y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We have a *murder* to solve, and yet you go around bothering everyone about *money*, arguing that you think it's 'somehow related to the case.'"

fields.Title: You: ""Thousands?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thousands?"

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, probably Graad, in that case.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, probably Graad, in that case."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""No, no, no. You've got to think *b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no, no. You've got to think *bigger* than that."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Precisely, which is why I'm not go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Precisely, which is why I'm not going to do it. Why would I do that when I can just speculate on exotic financial derivatives from the comfort of this shipping container?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The light around the individual in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The light around the individual in front of you changes somehow as you take the scroll. You can't figure out what's different -- you just know that it is.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "After you hand over the artwork, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: After you hand over the artwork, the voice from the light says: "Another deal complete. Welcome to the big leagues! If you haven't already, I'd advise you to consider hiring a Personal Brand Strategist."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, Savvy *isn't* my name. H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, Savvy *isn't* my name. Hope you'll excuse me. Let me introduce myself again..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""They are the very *unit* of capita..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They are the very *unit* of capital. You can buy them, sell them, even sit on them if you think it wise. Trust me when I say this -- becoming a shareholder means you're part of the *big leagues*."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Before I invest, I need to know mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Before I invest, I need to know more about the work. How do I know this asset is going to appreciate with time?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Just a hollow husk..." The blindin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just a hollow husk..." The blinding light becomes almost melancholy.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Don't you dare! This isn't the time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't you dare! This isn't the time. Put your personal feelings aside -- you're a salesman!

fields.Title: You: "(Lie.) "I haven't so much as squint..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Lie.) "I haven't so much as squinted at it. It's the exclusivity that gives it value."

fields.Title: You: ""Morve sur toile.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Morve sur toile."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Have you heard about it? At the mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you heard about it? At the moment, it's trading at more than 1.5x the price of gold. That's because it's an essential component in the next generation of radiocomputers..."

fields.Title: You: ""Staring at it long enough lets you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Staring at it long enough lets you immerse yourself in *karperie*."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Welcome! Come in, make yourself at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Welcome! Come in, make yourself at home. Sorry I'm not better able to receive you -- I wasn't expecting visitors today."
fields.Alternate1: "Welcome! Savvy, was it? Make yourself at home. Sorry I'm not better able to receive you -- I wasn't expecting visitors today."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, that despite his vices he is a competent detective."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you become so rich?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you become so rich?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, it's the chin.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, it's the chin."

fields.Title: You: ""For almighty Revachol, of course!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For almighty Revachol, of course!"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, Revachol. I remember walking i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, Revachol. I remember walking its streets as a teenager. There used to be a bowling alley in Stella Maris... I wonder if it's still there?"

fields.Title: You: ""You should invest in a youth centr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You should invest in a youth centre."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I don't normally do this without a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't normally do this without a formal pitch deck, but to hell with it, what's the point of being rich if you have to follow all the rules?"

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, are you having a stroke?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, are you having a stroke?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you with ho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at you with horror. You've been mumbling to your necktie in a daze for several minutes.

fields.Title: You: ""Brace yourself. It is *very* high..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Brace yourself. It is *very* high concept."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""We lost all of our money. High-art..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We lost all of our money. High-art types never deliver. They're only good for peddling welkins or whatever creeps they come up with."

fields.Title: You: ""Because they have guns!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because they have guns!"

fields.Title: You: ""Like they say in investment circle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like they say in investment circles, you gotta spend money to make money. Money's the name of the game here."

fields.Title: Variable["reputation.ask_for_money"] >= 2
Variable["reputation.ask_for_money"] >= 2
!(Variable["reputation.ask_for_money"] >= 2)
You: "(Yawn.) "Yeah, that does sound pret..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Yawn.) "Yeah, that does sound pretty tiresome."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But what do you say to those who c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But what do you say to those who claim that the assets underlying those derivatives are overvalued? Does that pose a systemic risk to the wider capital markets?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yes, yes, but the question is how..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes, but the question is how do we take advantage of those fluctuations?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Who'd have thought you'd remember t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Who'd have thought you'd remember that nugget of wisdom after nearly frying your brain like you have?

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's why I *should* invest? Are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's why I *should* invest? Are you trying to say that the RCM's bad reputation makes it an undervalued asset?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Still, the idea of a privatized po..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Still, the idea of a privatized police force is *extremely* forward thinking. You could even say it's *ultra* ultraliberal..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The RCM's problems aren't the kind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The RCM's problems aren't the kind you can solve with *radiocomputers*. The rot goes much deeper than that..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You need to think *bigger*. The en..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You need to think *bigger*. The entire org structure of the RCM needs to be redefined. You need a unified chain of command, an end to petty spats between precincts, new metrics for measuring performance that reward real *police work*. Does that sound right?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes! That's *precisely* what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes! That's *precisely* what we need."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's disappointment is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's disappointment is palpable. It's like someone just shot his dog.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Why go so soon? I feel we've so mu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why go so soon? I feel we've so much more to talk about. Ah, well. Until next time!"

fields.Title: You: ""What are these shares worth?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are these shares worth?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [shares hub]
Savoir Faire: "That's it, lap it up, buddy. That m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it, lap it up, buddy. That might have done it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Lying will get you nowhere. You can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lying will get you nowhere. You can't outrun the truth -- it will catch up to you one day.

fields.Title: You: ""Gross Profit.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gross Profit."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Even the lieutenant looks tense, wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even the lieutenant looks tense, waiting to see where this is going...

fields.Title: You: "Nod confidently."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nod confidently.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "She *could*, but she represents the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She *could*, but she represents the Wild Pines, which is the top of that particular game. No way she's stepping down from there. We need someone lower down.

fields.Title: You: ""It's actually just a mixing palett..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's actually just a mixing palette."

fields.Title: You: ""Value is something you should *dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Value is something you should *discover* for yourself. What do you see?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I see..." The light appears to con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I see..." The light appears to concentrate...

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's what I wanted to ask you ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's what I wanted to ask you about. Tell me, what's their *story*? Did they *suffer*?"

fields.Title: MRLG Main hub
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Anyhow, my name is Roustame Diodor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anyhow, my name is Roustame Diodore -- investor, licence holder, and extremely high-net-worth individual. And you are?"
fields.Alternate1: "Anyhow, my name is Roustame Diodore -- investor, licence holder, and extremely high-net-worth individual. And your name is Savvy, right?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, that despite his vices he is a competent detective."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You can't *hear* him, exactly, yet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can't *hear* him, exactly, yet you're able to understand every word he says. It is very strange. An overwhelming hum covers everything -- voice doesn't escape from him.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man exhales with a whistle. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man exhales with a whistle. "I gotta tell you, at first, being rich is a lot of work. You've got to work hard because everything's so darn expensive. You know, prices increase exponentially at this income level..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [MRLG Main hub]
Jump to: [MRLG Main hub]
You: ""Maybe? I wouldn't really know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe? I wouldn't really know."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yeah, on second thought, it couldn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, on second thought, it couldn't have been you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could you please stop asking peopl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could you please stop asking people for money? It does not reflect well on the RCM and to be perfectly frank we can't afford to look worse than we already do."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Harrier Du B..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pleasure to meet you, Harrier Du Bois," he says warmly. "I must admit, the name suits you very well."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""One would imagine living such a hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One would imagine living such a high-net-worth existence is overwhelmingly exciting, but yes, as you now see... it can sometimes just stun you with its boredom."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It is not possible. But what a dre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is not possible. But what a dream..." He shakes his head. "Either way, even if I could do it, I certainly wouldn't give an incompetent and corrupt police force *WORLD-ENDING* weaponry."

fields.Title: Variable["reputation.kim"] > 0
Variable["reputation.kim"] > 0
!(Variable["reputation.kim"] > 0)
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmm. I don't believe in giving any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm. I don't believe in giving anyone money for nothing, but maybe there's something to using *market incentives* to improve performance..."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "In the very, very early days of col..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the very, very early days of colonizing this archipelago, the Kingdom of Suresne, a precursor of modern Sur-La-Clef, used to own the city of Revachol. An obscure detail in the bigger picture, but still -- worth dropping.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "You better explain that you aren't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You better explain that you aren't Savvy, by the way. Can't have you nicking this identity after working hard to gain such a prodigious rep.

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, a fellow entrepreneur. Tremend..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, a fellow entrepreneur. Tremendous! The art market? Intriguing. Sure, I'm keen. What are you thinking?"

fields.Title: 3q hub
Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well, I'm sure her work represents some very interesting *internal* struggle. Probably with mental illness. Yes, that sounds right."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hm. Seems unhygienic. Is that what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hm. Seems unhygienic. Is that what's *in* these days?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Perhaps I could be the one to 'dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps I could be the one to 'discover' it? To share it with the wider world..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Something's rattling within you. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something's rattling within you. It feels like the first penny dropped into a piggy bank.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "He's so close to envisioning what's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's so close to envisioning what's beyond. Just needs a little push over the edge...

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What an original idea! By drawing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What an original idea! By drawing our focus away from the final piece we gain a new appreciation for the craft behind it. An art in its own right that is usually hidden from us."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Keith? Just *Keith*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Keith? Just *Keith*?"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Keith," he repeats."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Keith," he repeats.

fields.Title: You: ""The artist was struggling. *Really..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The artist was struggling. *Really* struggling."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Sounds like a hell of a trip. I re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like a hell of a trip. I really must experience it for myself." The light emanating from him seems to intensify.

fields.Title: You: ""What are you doing in this contain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you doing in this container?"

fields.Title: You: ""My name is Harry, and I'm a detect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My name is Harry, and I'm a detective."

fields.Title: You: ""Hello!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello!"

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you," he says war..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pleasure to meet you," he says warmly. "Though I'm sorry to hear that a good public servant like yourself is in thrall to the drink. A man can't serve two masters, in my experience."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man chuckles. "It's quite alrig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man chuckles. "It's quite alright. I'm used to the question by now. To be blunt, I inherited my fortune from my grandmother, who, herself, was an extremely high-net-worth individual back in Graad..."

fields.Title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What do you mean?" His... essence..."

Encyclopedia: "The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient is a ratio designed to reflect the difference in net worth between individuals. When the coefficient is close to 1 (or 100%) it means one person possesses all the net worth among that group of individuals. It's been observed that when the Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient reaches about .96 or so, the laws of physics begin to bend around the high-net-worth individual.
